statements: SELECT * FROM spending_reports WHERE user_id = 123;
SELECT report_id, total_spending FROM spending_reports WHERE report_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT user_id, income FROM spending_reports WHERE total_spending > 1000 ORDER BY income DESC;
SELECT user_id, total_spending FROM spending_reports WHERE total_spending BETWEEN 500 AND 1000 ORDER BY user_id ASC;
SELECT report_id, user_id, total_spending, income FROM spending_reports WHERE income IS NOT NULL AND total_spending IS NOT NULL;
SELECT user_id, total_spending FROM spending_reports WHERE income > 5000 ORDER BY total_spending DESC;
SELECT report_id, report_date FROM spending_reports WHERE total_spending < 1000;
SELECT * FROM spending_reports WHERE report_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-06-30' ORDER BY report_date DESC;
SELECT user_id, SUM(total_spending) AS total_spending_per_user FROM spending_reports GROUP BY user_id HAVING total_spending_per_user > 5000;
SELECT report_id, total_spending, income, user_id FROM spending_reports WHERE income IS NULL;
SELECT report_name, spending_amount, report_date FROM reports;
SELECT category_name, category_type FROM categories WHERE budget_limit > 500;
SELECT * FROM reports WHERE saving_opportunity IS NULL LIMIT 5;
SELECT report_name, spending_amount FROM reports WHERE report_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-28';
SELECT category_name, budget_limit FROM categories ORDER BY budget_limit DESC;
SELECT * FROM reports WHERE report_date = '2022-01-01';
SELECT report_name, spending_amount FROM reports WHERE spending_amount > 1000 ORDER BY spending_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM reports WHERE saving_opportunity IS NOT NULL AND spending_amount BETWEEN 500 AND 1000;
SELECT report_name, spending_amount, report_date FROM reports WHERE report_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY report_date ASC;
SELECT r.report_name, c.category_name FROM reports r JOIN categories c ON r.spending_amount > c.budget_limit;
SELECT * FROM spending_reports;
SELECT report_name, total_spending FROM spending_reports WHERE total_spending > 5000;
SELECT category_name, target_savings FROM savings_categories ORDER BY target_savings DESC;
SELECT s.report_id, s.category_id, sd.spending_amount FROM spending_reports s INNER JOIN spending_details sd ON s.report_id = sd.report_id;

SELECT report_name, category_name, sd.spending_amount FROM spending_reports sr INNER JOIN spending_details sd ON sr.report_id = sd.report_id INNER JOIN savings_categories sc ON sd.category_id = sc.category_id WHERE sr.total_spending > 10000 AND sc.target_savings < 5000;
SELECT * FROM spending_reports;
SELECT report_name, total_spending FROM spending_reports WHERE total_spending > 1000 ORDER BY total_spending DESC;
SELECT sr.report_name, sd.spending_amount FROM spending_reports sr JOIN spending_details sd ON sr.report_id = sd.report_id WHERE sr.report_id = 1;
SELECT sc.category_name, sum(sd.spending_amount) AS total_spending FROM savings_categories sc JOIN spending_details sd ON sc.category_id = sd.category_id GROUP BY sc.category_name;

SELECT sr.report_id, sc.category_name, sd.spending_amount FROM spending_reports sr JOIN spending_details sd ON sr.report_id = sd.report_id JOIN savings_categories sc ON sd.category_id = sc.category_id ORDER BY sr.report_id, sd.spending_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM spending_reports;
SELECT report_name, report_date FROM spending_reports WHERE user_id = 123;
SELECT category_name, description FROM spending_categories ORDER BY category_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE transaction_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT user_id, COUNT(transaction_id) AS total_transactions FROM transactions GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT * FROM spending_reports ORDER BY report_date DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT report_name, report_date FROM spending_reports WHERE user_id = 100 ORDER BY report_date ASC

SELECT category_name, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM transactions JOIN spending_categories ON transactions.category_id = spending_categories.category_id GROUP BY category_name ORDER BY total_amount DESC
SELECT report_name, report_date FROM spending_reports WHERE user_id = 200 AND report_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30'
SELECT user_id, COUNT(transaction_id) AS total_transactions FROM transactions GROUP BY user_id HAVING total_transactions > 5
SELECT * FROM users WHERE age > 25
SELECT name, email FROM users ORDER BY name DESC
SELECT category, SUM(amount) FROM transactions GROUP BY category
SELECT * FROM savings_goals WHERE goal_amount > 5000 ORDER BY target_date
SELECT user_id, gender FROM users WHERE gender = 'Female'
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT user_id, SUM(amount) AS total_spent FROM transactions GROUP BY user_id HAVING total_spent > 5000;
SELECT t.*, u.name AS user_name, c.name AS category_name FROM transactions t JOIN users u ON t.user_id = u.user_id JOIN categories c ON t.category = c.name WHERE u.age >= 30 ORDER BY t.amount DESC;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS total_transactions FROM transactions_history GROUP BY user_id ORDER BY total_transactions DESC;
SELECT t.transaction_id, t.amount, t.category, u.name AS user_name FROM transactions t LEFT JOIN users u ON t.user_id = u.user_id WHERE u.gender = 'female' AND t.transaction_date > '2021-01-01';
